title: What is your rarest skin
body:
M raest skins are skt t1 zed, lee, zyra, jax and vayne

I got El Tigre Braum, I haven't ever seen one.
It would either be Nutcrako (is that rare?) or one of {{champion:133}}'s skins. Is there any way to find out the rarity of skins easily?
Well nutcrako is legacy and both of Quinn's skins are just normal and can be purchased at anytime. Although not a lot of people play Quinn so I guess her normal skins are kinda rare to see?

>Although not a lot of people play Quinn so I guess her normal skins are kinda rare to see?

Exactly. That makes it a bit hard to determine which is rarer without an accurate (or semi-accurate) list of skins based on rarity.
